trans-unit.source: Use the `UpdateManifestForBrowserApplication` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o `UpdateManifestForBrowserApplication` elemento no ficheiro do projeto para criar e executar esta tarefa.

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [UpdateManifestForBrowserApplication](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para informações de utilização e o parâmetro, consulte [UpdateManifestForBrowserApplication](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UpdateManifestForBrowserApplication"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.UpdateManifestForBrowserApplication"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path and name of the application manifest file that you want to add the `<hostInBrowser></hostInBrowser>` element to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho e nome do manifesto do ficheiro de aplicação que pretende adicionar o `<hostInBrowser></hostInBrowser>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The path and name of the application manifest file that you want to add the `<hostInBrowser></hostInBrowser>` element to.
trans-unit.target: O caminho e nome da aplicação manifesto do ficheiro que pretende adicionar o `<hostInBrowser></hostInBrowser>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the task executed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a tarefa foi executada com êxito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether to modify the application manifest to include the **<hostInBrowser />** element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se deve modificar o manifesto da aplicação para incluir o ** <hostInBrowser /> ** elemento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to modify the application manifest to include the **<hostInBrowser />** element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para modificar o manifesto da aplicação para incluir o ** <hostInBrowser /> ** elemento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
